step1.title: Step 1
step1.instructions: In this step, we'll ask you which type of property you have and if guests will book the entire place or just a room. Then let us know the location and how many guests can stay.

step2.title: Step 2
step2.instructions: In this step, you’ll add some of the amenities your place offers, plus 5 or more photos. Then you’ll create a title anddescription.

step3.title: Step 3
step3.instructions: Finally, you’ll choose booking settings, set up pricing and publish your listing.
